name: CHEESE CHASER (Sean Michael, Benjamin Pilbrow)
description:
You play as Chucky Chase, the local cheese maker in MYC (Mouse York City), and all of your precious cheese has been stolen! Run and fly your way through the city to get back your supply before demand increases to unstable levels. 


Controls:

Running

LMB / RMB - Alternate pressing to build your stamina and keep it from depleting.

Use the MOUSE to look around.

Run through the Landmine infested streets of MYC to get to your plane and take flight!

Flying

LMB - Shoot Fork

RMB - Gain Altitude

Use the MOUSE to look around.

Time your shots through the propeller of your plane and  avoid Air Mines and buildings. Collect Cheese by shooting down enemy CHEESE DRONES and Air Crates. The more cheese you collect the more powerful your Forks become. Once your Fork is strong enough, you can take down the MEGA cheese

Credits:
